title: A Touch of Spring
description: A brand new erotic short story from bestselling author of the 'Pleasures' series, Evie Hunter...  A ski holiday turns into a nightmare when Roz Spring is caught in an avalanche. She wakes in hospital with perilous gaps in her memory and a man by her bedside who claims to be her husband.  Roz has no idea why she's in Zermatt, but she does remember him. Tall, dark and dangerous, Andy McTavish has been on her trail since she stole a fabulous ruby. Now he's tracked her down and she has nowhere left to run.  Snowbound in an Alpine village, the red-hot attraction between them catches fire. But that's not her biggest problem. A priceless Van Gogh has gone missing and Roz is the prime suspect. Can she stay one step ahead of Andy and the law?  Or will she lose her freedom and her heart?
author: Evie Hunter
